actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources

official_title: A bill for the relief of Norman Raymond Lee.

summary.text: Declares that the failure of a named individual to make a proper recordation of his mining claims shall not constitute an abandonment of any of his unpatented mining claims located prior to a specified date.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Norman Raymond Lee.
